name: Freezing Beauty
simple_desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on a random enemy.
desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a #1[i]% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for #2[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
